dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: In lakes and swamps; locally consumed, smoked (Ref. 40602).  Maximum length 20 cm TL (Ref. 13614).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: South America:  Amazon River basin, in the upper Negro River drainage in Brazil; Orinoco River basin, along the Orinoco River in Colombia and Venezuela.
